operation.name: InsertOrUpdate
operation.sql: INSERT INTO user_notify_settings (user_id, peer_type, peer_id, show_previews, silent, mute_until, sound) VALUES (:user_id, :peer_type, :peer_id, :show_previews, :silent, :mute_until, :sound) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE show_previews = VALUES(show_previews), silent = VALUES(silent), mute_until = VALUES(mute_until), sound = VALUES(sound), deleted = 0

operation.name: SelectAll
operation.sql: SELECT id, user_id, peer_type, peer_id, show_previews, silent, mute_until, sound FROM user_notify_settings WHERE user_id=:user_id AND deleted = 0

operation.name: Select
operation.sql: SELECT id, user_id, peer_type, peer_id, show_previews, silent, mute_until, sound FROM user_notify_settings WHERE user_id = :user_id AND peer_type = :peer_type AND peer_id=:peer_id AND deleted = 0

operation.name: DeleteAll
operation.sql: UPDATE user_notify_settings SET deleted = 1 WHERE user_id = :user_id
